## Release summary

Version number: [e.g. 1.8.0]

## Release details

Describe in short the main changes with the new release.

## Checklist

_Put an `x` in the boxes that apply._

- [ ] I have read the [CONTRIBUTING](../CONTRIBUTING.md) doc.
- [ ] I am making a pull request against the `main` branch (left side).
- [ ] I've updated the dependencies versions to the latest, wherever is possible.
- [ ] Tests pass locally (please run tests manually).
- [ ] I built the documentation and updated it with the latest changes.
- [ ] I updated diagnostic code documentation using `npm run diagnostic-codes` in `server`module.
- [ ] I've added an item in `CHANGELOG.md` for this release.
- [ ] I bumped the version number using `update_version.sh` file.
- [ ] I checked that the `npm run package` command works.
- [ ] I checked that the newly built `.vsix` extension can be installed in VSCode and works.
- [ ] After merging the PR, I'll publish the build in the release channel. 
- [ ] After merging the PR, I'll tag the repo with `${VERSION_NUMVER}` (e.g. `1.8.0`).

## Further comments

Write here any other comment about the release, if any.
